<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Prevailing Position](/Feats.aspx?ID=6020) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=656" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 124 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Trigger**
You are targeted by an attack or attempt a Reflex saving throw against a damaging effect, and you are in a [stance](/Traits.aspx?ID=701).

</column>

---

Your flexibility with stances lets you sacrifice their benefits to better protect yourself. You leave the stance you were in, gaining a +4 circumstance bonus to the triggering saving throw or to your AC against the triggering attack.
name: Prevailing Position
